basics.label: Placement Agent / Dorado Beach Resort
basics.summary: An accomplished banking professional with a wealth of expertise in financial analysis, credit analysis, corporate transactions, and mergers & acquisitions. Skilled in various financial softwares and tools like DBC Finance, Argus Real Estate, SNL Financial, Bloomberg, Capital IQ, Thomson One Banker, and Factset. Holds a FINRA Series 7 License and is an expert in MS Excel.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Structured the Platinum Banking team of FirstBank Puerto Rico (NYSE: FBP). Led a team of experienced banking professionals dedicated to serving Act 20/22 clients on all financial needs. Services include business and individual deposit accounts, commercial loans, cash management services, high-yield accounts, credit cards, mortgages, leasing, OREOs and other resources available at the Bank.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Achieved 45% market share with over 200 clients in less than 1 year. Created dynamic financial models for sell-side and buy-side advisory transactions. Analyzed AFICA's new money and refunding debt, as well as equity offerings for issuers, including hotel and real estate developments, financial institutions, general industrials, the Government of Puerto Rico and several of its authorities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Advised Technology, Media and Telecom clients on potential transactions, including: mergers, acquisitions, private equity investments, leveraged buyouts, and capital raising. Involved in all aspects of deal generation and implementation.

education.institution: Academia del Perpetuo Socorro High School

awards.title: NCAA / ITA Varsity Scholar-Athlete Award Winner
Recipient of Stuart B. Ludlum Award '69
